text:
Please answer all parts of the following questionnaire:
I. I approve of William Barley for President under the conditions
mentioned in Miles* memo of August 2.
I disapprove of William Barley for President under the conditions
mentioned in Miles’ memo of August 2*
II* I approve of Barry Stonia’s continuing (part time) as President
until November under conditions mentioned in JSlsomia’s memo
of August 3.
I disapprove of Harry S&arnia’s continuing (part time) as President
until November 1 under conditions mentioned in Scomia’s memo of
August 3*
